Package Hangman

Class Logic

java.lang.Object
Hangman.Logic
public class Logic extends Object
The Logic class handles all game logic associated with the Hangman gameplay

    • generateWord

      public String generateWord()
      Selects a random word from the WORDS array based off a random number
      Returns:
      The random word selected

    • requestWord

      public String requestWord() throws IOException
      Request random word from random word API using HTTP GET request, if request fails, fall back to local word array
      Parameters:
      wordLength - The desired length for the random word
      Returns:
      The random word returned
      Throws:
      IOException - If reading the HTTP GET response fails

    • generateWordProgress

      public ArrayList<Character> generateWordProgress(String randomWord)
      Creates an ArrayList containing the "-" character for each of the letters in the random word
      Parameters:
      randomWord - The random word for the current game
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of dashes

    • generateWordArray

      public ArrayList<Character> generateWordArray(String randomWord)
      Breaks up the random word into individual characters and creates and ArrayList of characters
      Parameters:
      randomWord - The random word for the current game
      Returns:
      The ArrayList containting the characters of the current random word

    • getHangManState

      public String getHangManState(int index)
      Outputs the current visual for the current progress in the hangman game
      Parameters:
      index - The number of guesses the player has left
      Returns:
      The current hangman visual

    • charInput

      public void charInput(JTextField input, JLabel progress, JLabel guessCounter, JLabel hangman, JLabel lLetters, ImageIcon imageIcon)
      Gets the user's current guess, checks if the letter guessed is in the word, updates current game data, and updates UI to reflect the guess
      Parameters:
      input - JtextField containing user input
      progress - JLabel that outputs the which letters the user has correctly guessed
      guessCounter - JLabel that shows how many guesses the user has left
      hangman - JLabel that displays the current hangman picture to replect user's progress
      imageIncon - passes the imagine icon in App to the method when the setHangmanState method is called

    • wordInput

      public void wordInput(JTextField charInput, JTextField input, JLabel progress, JLabel wins, JLabel losses, JLabel lnumGuesses, JLabel hangman, JLabel lLetters)
      Gets the full word guessed and checks if it is the correct word for the current game
      Parameters:
      charInput - JTextField for the character guessing field
      input - JTextField containing the word the user is currently guessing
      progress - JLabel that outputs the which letters the user has correctly guessed
      wins - JLabel that diaplays how many wins the user has
      losses - JLabel that diaplays how many losses the user has
      lnumGuesses - JLabel that displays how many guesses the user has left
      hangman - JLabel that displays the current hangman picture to replect user's progress
